original_text: These are the sons of Gilead: of Iezer, the clan of the Iezerites; of Helek, the clan of the Helekites;
korean_text: 길르앗 자손은 이러하니 이에셀에게서 난 이에셀 종족과 헬렉에게서 난 헬렉 종족과

sentences.original_text: These are the sons of Gilead
of Iezer, the clan of the Iezerites
of Helek, the clan of the Helekites
